## count() function

Returns the number of values in an array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function count<T>(array: T[]): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>T[]</code> | the array to count the values of |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the number of values in the array
